dashboard.title: Training Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Your AI-powered training companion
dashboard.setRaceGoal: Set a race goal to see training paces
dashboard.addGoal: Add your first race goal to get personalized training recommendations
dashboard.loginRequiredMessage: Please log in to view your training dashboard.

readiness.readyForQualityDesc: Your body is well-recovered and ready for hard training.
readiness.moderateTrainingDesc: Some fatigue present. Consider moderate intensity today.
readiness.recoveryFocusDesc: High fatigue detected. Prioritize rest or easy activity.

workouts.title: Workouts
workouts.subtitle: View and analyze your training history

garmin.title: Garmin Connect
garmin.subtitle: Sync your activities from Garmin
garmin.securityNote: Your password is only used for this sync request and is not stored. We recommend using HTTPS in production.
garmin.securityNoteEncrypted: Your credentials will be securely stored on the server to enable automatic daily syncing.
garmin.error: Please enter your Garmin Connect email and password
garmin.disconnectConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect your Garmin account?

sync.title: Sync Activities
sync.subtitle: Connect to Garmin to import your activities
sync.howItWorksDesc: Enter your Garmin Connect credentials. Your password is only used for this sync request and is not stored.
sync.selectDays: Select how many days of activities you want to import. More days means longer sync time.
sync.activitiesStored: Activities are downloaded and stored locally. You can then analyze them with AI-powered insights.

connect.title: Connect Services
connect.subtitle: Import your workouts and share your analysis

plans.title: Training Plans
plans.subtitle: Create and manage your training plans
plans.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this plan?
plans.notFoundDesc: The plan you are looking for does not exist.

goals.title: Race Goals
goals.subtitle: Set your race targets
goals.noGoalsDesc: Add your first race goal to get started

errors.notFoundDesc: The page you are looking for does not exist.

chat.title: AI Coach
chat.subtitle: Your personal AI training assistant
chat.placeholder: Ask me anything about your training...
chat.emptyDescription: Ask me about your training, fitness metrics, workout recommendations, or anything related to your athletic performance.
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
chat.lockedDescription: AI Coach Chat unlocks at Level {level}. Keep training to level up!
chat.disclaimer: AI responses are for informational purposes. Always consult a professional for medical advice.

vo2max.title: VO2 Max
vo2max.syncGarmin: Sync with Garmin to see your VO2 Max

tooltip.title: VO2 Max (Maximal Oxygen Uptake)
tooltip.description: The maximum amount of oxygen your body can use during intense exercise. Higher values indicate better cardiovascular fitness. Elite runners typically have 70+ ml/kg/min. Improve it with consistent aerobic training and high-intensity intervals.

achievements.vo2max_first_desc: Record your first VO2 Max measurement
achievements.vo2max_up_3_desc: Improve your VO2 Max by 3% from baseline
achievements.vo2max_up_5_desc: Improve your VO2 Max by 5% from baseline
achievements.vo2max_up_10_desc: Improve your VO2 Max by 10% from baseline
achievements.vo2max_up_15_desc: Improve your VO2 Max by 15% from baseline
achievements.vo2max_trend_4w_desc: VO2 Max trending upward for 4 consecutive weeks
achievements.vo2max_trend_8w_desc: VO2 Max trending upward for 8 consecutive weeks
achievements.zone5_warrior_desc: Accumulate 60 minutes in heart rate Zone 5
achievements.vo2max_pr_desc: Set a new personal VO2 Max record

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Track your progress and unlock rewards
achievements.keepTraining: Keep training to unlock your first achievement!

unlockCelebration.title: Feature Unlocked!
unlockCelebration.levelReached: You've reached Level {level} and unlocked this feature!

levelRewards.title: Level Rewards
levelRewards.subtitle: Unlock new features as you progress

5.name: Dedicated
5.title: Dedicated Athlete
5.description: Advanced metrics and fatigue modeling unlocked!

8.name: Committed
8.title: Committed Trainer
8.description: AI Coach chat and personalized tips unlocked!

10.name: Athlete
10.title: Serious Athlete
10.description: Training plan generation and race predictions unlocked!

15.name: Advanced
15.title: Advanced Performer
15.description: Custom workout design with Garmin FIT export unlocked!

20.name: Expert
20.title: Training Expert
20.description: Periodization planner and peak optimization unlocked!

25.name: Elite
25.title: Elite Performer
25.description: Coach mode unlocked - help others train!

30.name: Master
30.title: Training Master
30.description: All features unlocked + early access to new features!

strava.title: Strava Integration
strava.subtitle: Share your workout analysis to Strava
strava.pageSubtitle: Connect your Strava account to automatically share workout analysis
strava.notConnectedDesc: Connect your Strava account to automatically update your activity descriptions with AI-powered workout analysis.
strava.autoUpdateDescriptionHint: Automatically update Strava activity descriptions when workouts are analyzed
strava.includeScoreHint: Add the overall workout quality score to your Strava description
strava.includeSummaryHint: Add a one-line summary of your workout performance
strava.includeLinkHint: Add a link to view the full workout analysis
strava.useExtendedFormatHint: Include additional details like training effect and recovery time
strava.permissionsTitle: Strava will request the following permissions:
strava.howItWorksStep1: Connect your Strava account using the button above. You'll be redirected to Strava to authorize the connection.
strava.howItWorksStep2: After your workouts are analyzed, the analysis will be automatically added to your Strava activity description.
strava.howItWorksStep3: Your friends on Strava will see your workout score and a link to view the full analysis.
strava.featureAutoSyncDesc: Workouts are automatically detected and analyzed
strava.featureAnalysisDesc: Get detailed insights about your performance
strava.featureShareDesc: Your workout analysis appears on your Strava activity
strava.callbackConnectingDesc: Please wait while we complete the connection
strava.callbackSuccessDesc: Your Strava account is now connected
strava.callbackSuccessWithName: Welcome, {name}! Your Strava account is now connected.
strava.errorAccessDenied: You denied access to your Strava account
strava.errorNoCode: No authorization code received from Strava

zones.title: Training Zones
zones.subtitle: View your heart rate zones and training paces

trainingPaces.title: Training Paces
trainingPaces.description: Recommended paces for different training intensities
trainingPaces.tooltip: Training paces are calculated based on your race goals and current fitness level. They help you train at the right intensity for different workout types.
trainingPaces.noPaces: Set a race goal to see training paces

hrZones.title: Heart Rate Zones
hrZones.description: Intensity zones based on your max heart rate
hrZones.tooltip: Heart rate zones help you train at the right intensity. Zone 1 is easy recovery, while Zone 5 is maximum effort. Training in different zones develops different physiological adaptations.

physiology.title: Physiological Metrics
physiology.description: Your key heart rate and performance metrics
physiology.tooltip: These metrics are the foundation for calculating your training zones and paces. They're based on your recent training data and Garmin measurements.
physiology.vdotTooltip: VDOT is a measure of your running fitness developed by Jack Daniels. Higher values indicate better aerobic capacity and running economy.

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Welcome back! Please enter your credentials.

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Start your training journey today!
register.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

featureGate.almostThereLevel: Almost there! Reach Level {level} to unlock
